Fit ARIMA to Price Paths (Log-Returns)

fit_arima_returns.Rd

Fits an ARIMA model to the log-returns of a price series to capture the physical measure dynamics.

Usage

fit_arima_returns(prices, ...)

Arguments

prices

Numeric vector or time series of prices.

...

Arguments passed to forecast::auto.arima.

Value

An object of class forecast_ARIMA.

On this page
